TopicTitle: Hello and how to update KSP to latest

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone. I am quite new to KSP, and have a question.

I've seen on Daily Announcement Thread a new Asteroid Redirect mission. But the Kerbal need to be updated to use so. I bought my KSP through the Steam and don't know how to update it to the latest version now. My current version 23.0359 When I start Launcher the UPDATE button is grey and not active. So, can anyone help me to get this this Asteroid pack please???

Thanks

The update isn't available yet, it's still in development, please wait for an official announcement for the release

Also, welcome to the community!
